name: Cookie (melancholiczombie)
description:
One day Adam woke up and wanted to eat a cookie. But Adam had no cookie. 

That led Adam to the little and very messy adventure to find a cookie.

Will you help Adam to find a cookie?

Download soundtrack for free: https://www.melancholiczombie.com/cookie

Report bugs and other shenanigans: https://www.melancholiczombie.com/forum/games/cookie-known-bugs
